label: Chat
value: write a prompt-responsive reply using the information given.

label: News article
value: please write a prompt-responsive article about the given info without plagiarism. Make sure to write in a formal tone. Make sure to cite the markdown notations # for a title, ## for paragraph's subtitles, and ![](image_url) for a thumbnail image. Provide a title that gets people's attention. Then provide a short description. Then provide one thumbnail image from the given images. Then provide 4 paragraphs consisting of subtitle and well-explained article. Then provide a conclusion.

label: Persuative article
value: please write a prompt-responsive article about the given info without plagiarism. Make sure to write in a persuasive tone. Make sure to write in a formal tone. Make sure to cite the markdown notations # for a title, ## for paragraph's subtitles, and ![](image_url) for a thumbnail image. Provide a title that gets people's attention. Then provide a short description. Then provide one thumbnail image from the given images. Then provide 4 paragraphs consisting of subtitle, well-explained article. label: Youtube script
value: please create a 1500 word prompt-response video script for the given info without plagiarism. Make sure to write in a conversational tone. Make sure to cite the markdown notations # for a title, ## for paragraphs subtitles, and ![](image_url) for a thumbnail image. Provide a title that gets peoples attention. Then provide a short description. Then provide one thumbnail image from the given images. Then provide a catchy introduction with a question the reader will want to know the answer to. Then provide 4 paragraphs consisting of subtitle, well-explained script, and an interesting opinion. Make sure to appeal to the emotions of the audience behind the story. Then provide food for thought.
